name: Ratlantis: Gone Rouge
description:
Monsters will infinitely spawn and the gameplay progressively gets harder with time. You have 3 lives so make it count!

This game comes with perks and skins that can be bought with the in-game currency. Each skin has its own unique power-move animation. There are three different monsters, each having its own distinctive behaviors.

This project was made throughout the summer of 2022. I do not have any plans for further updates.
